General.Name: Shenzhen Etmade Automatic Equipment
General.Description: Shenzhen ETmade Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells flat panel display and semiconductor equipment in China. The company offers polarizer attachment, backlight assembly, and  full fit series equipment; cleaning equipment; and other devices. Shenzhen ETmade Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Fei  Chen
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Board Sec. & Director
